fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Main EU initiatives, policies and legislative files currently followed by the organisation include corporate law and financial transparency initiatives.
position: Avocat - Advocaat - Member of the Brussels' Bar
relevant_communication: Relevant policy implementation, public relations and communications activitiés (scientific publications, events) relate to corporate law and financial and non-financial reporting (including relating to the implementation of the statutory audit directive and of the non-financial disclosure requirements directive for public interest entities).
goals__remit: The law firm provides national and international clients with legal services in relation to corporate law, legal compliance and regulatory affairs.
